title: Happy Thanksgiving!
paragraph: Check our hours for open times during the holiday break.

image-alt: hands gesturing in workshop by Headway on unsplash
title: The Data Hub
paragraph: The Data Hub is a new space and service point providing support in Geospatial and Data Sciences. Help is available 11am - 3pm, Mon - Fri!

image-alt: Photograph of the MILL space showing 3d printers and computers
title: Visit The MILL
paragraph: Join us for workshops every week at the library's Making, Innovating, and Learning Laboratory (MILL)

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
